New Records: CJ McCollum matched his career high with 50 points, the highest single-game score in Pelicans history; He made 10 three-pointers, a franchise record
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum's 50-point performance was a turning point in the game; The Pelicans ended an 11-game losing streak with the win
Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum had been struggling with his three-point shooting earlier in the season; He vowed to improve and did so with a strong performance
Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans coach Willie Green praised McCollum's performance; Trey Murphy highlighted the significance of McCollum's return to his former dominance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Smoothie King Center; CJ McCollum's performance motivated his family and inspired him to continue working hard
